data.expected_result: Category B should not be seen on your main, because there are no channels in the category, and your main does not have Manage Channel permission.
data.short_description: You can see categories without any channels on Notification Overrides.
data.steps_to_repro: - ON YOUR ALT, create a server, and create Category A, Category B, and Category C. - On Category A and C, create some channels, but on Category B, don't have any channels. - Then, send an invite to your MAIN ACCOUNT, and join it. Make sure your main account doesn't have "Manage channels" permission. - On your main account, click on the 3 dots next to the server name, and click on Notification Settings. - Scroll down to Notification Overrides, and select "Add a Channel or Category". - Observe how Category B can be seen.
